channel.title: Sinister 718- Active Forum - Helpful Community - Great PvM - Upated Daily - Join
channel.description:
**Note** This server was previously called "SinisterPK"
[CENTER]Join Us at [url=http://www.sinister718.com]sinister718[/url] Play Now at [url=http://www.sinister718.com/play.php]sinister718 Webclient[/url] Download Our Client at [url=http://sinister718.com/Sinister718.jar]http://sinister718.com/Sinister718.jar[/url][/CENTER]
Our Promotional videos:

Join the best rsps @ www.sinister718.com ! We are a 718, growing fast! Looking for professional staff! please check us out!
Hey guys! welcome to the advertisement of Sinister Pk! We are a new 718 server that just opened up, and we need new dedicated players. Of course this means that there are no staff, so we need staffs. This server is updated daily, to deliver the best contents! I hope you guys decide to join us in our great adventure!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/12.jpg[/img]

Dungeoneering fully working with a shop!

Global Teleports to get around easily

This is how you claim your stuff!

We have construction! Working on perfecting it!

[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/23.jpg[/img]
We have Runecafting!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/24.jpg[/img]
Perfect Farming w/ a shop!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/26.jpg[/img]
We have Glacors!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/25.jpg[/img]
We have Hunter aswell!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/27.jpg[/img]
Perfect Lodestones to get to cities faster
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/28.jpg[/img]
Perfect Dwarf Cannon!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/29.jpg[/img]
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/30.jpg[/img]
Perfect Wildywyrm!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/31.jpg[/img]
Perfect Chaos Elemental!
[img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/32.jpg[/img] [img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/33.jpg[/img] [img]http://sinister718.com/extimg/34.jpg[/img]
Many custom donation options!
We are updated daily!
Some Updates- [CODE]1. Fixed every single xp rate for skills 2. Added wild agility course teleport 3. Added Glacors 4. Fixed the amount of hits a dragon breath hits on antifire potion + anti-fire shield 5. Added chaos elemental 6. Added dagganoths 7. Fixed QBD teleport 8. Fixed Lodes stone teleports 9. Added Troll Invasion minigame 10. Added wildywyrm and ice strykewyrms 11. Fixed corp beast safe spot 12. Added crashing star 13. Added Donator shop for donator points 14. Added Donator Shops in donator zone that sell stuff for gp 15. Added Farming 16. Added Hunter 17. Items over 5m can't be sold to shop [FIX] 18. Added Skill Point System 19. Added Daily Task System 20. Fixed SOF item rarity 21. Added Clan Slayer 22. Added Statistics Panel 23. Added Trivia 24. Added Dwarf multi Cannon 25. Added Slayer Shop 26. Added Slayer Helmet 27. Added Upgrade donator lamp 28. Added dicing 29. Added Runecrafting 30. Added Essence mining 31. Fixed Hunter xp 32. Added crystal chest 33. Fixed Smithing exp 34. Fixed Herblore glitch with unf pots 35. Wolpintinger & Unicorn pouch can now be made 36. Metal Dragons now fixed 37. Added hunter skillcape to shop 38. Mature grotworms now die 39. Added makeover Thallesia & that wizard guy 40. Made Wild agility course door teleport people home 41. Fixed item kept on death 42. Added nex hit cap 43. Fixed farm bug, 44. Wild agility course, mass click bug fixed 45. You can now tele while in combat in chaos tunnels 46. Nex is now clipped, and can not enter the bank are 47. Fixed shop's "50" and "500" buttons 48. Fixed trading 49. Lowered slay xp 50. Now you can not withdraw money from coin pouch with a full inventory 51. Glacors have been made weak to fire spells 52. Added hunter cape to the skill cape shop 53. Teleport icon added to fixed more 54. Nex has been perfected 55. Kiln has been perfected [not yet, working on it] 56. Fixed barrows chest loots 57. Added drops for revs 58. Fixed Glacors drop rates 59. Switched woodcutting tp to camelot 60. NOW WHEN YOU DIE, YOU LOOSE ITEMS. 61. Nex now has minions that work perfectly 62. Duel arena dupe has been fixed 63. Fight cave fire cape bug has been patched 2/3/14 64. New Client added w/ loader 65. New Cache added 66. Added perfect summoning 67. loader has been removed as it caused issues 68. added perfect construction 69. added quests 70. added prestige system [/CODE]
